attributes.action: Stop knife crime get these youngsters into the army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So many of these youngsters have no focus to their lives, no future, no guidance and no respect either for themselves or others.
It is time to change this. Lets get them into the services. I can already hear the human rights group calling foul. So lets quiet them by offering the youngsters a choice as follows;
1. Stay at school and complete your studies.
2. Find a job with good prospects/ training.
3.Join the services for 2 years.
No more roaming the streets and behaving like feral beasts.
3 Options pick one and learn about life properly not from feral gangs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
